The game is certainly good, but there are a lot of honest players who spoil the idea of ​​this trash

Honestly, the game is pretty fun at first.
But, when you play a little bit, like 200 hours or so, you notice, that the game actually makes no fun at all.
The matchmaking is super unbalanced and either your team loses 16-0 or your team will win the game 16-0.
And also there are the smurfs... Yeah. They pretty much ruin the game for every new player. And I dont even want to begin with the Team-voicechat when you are between Silver 1 and maybe like MGE. If you live in Europe like me, you get queued with russians and non-english speakers a lot. So, your team doesn´t have any sort of communication and is most likely going to lose the game. 

I would recommend the game if you have no problem with smurfs or being in a team with absolute noobs and have teammates who dont speak english. 
I would not recommend the game, if you have a proplem with less communication and a abd team. 

But at the end, decide for yourself. 

- DreAM
